p: The galvanostatic discharge–charge curves (capacities vs. voltage) at 1000 mA g −1 between 0.010 and 3.000 V (vs. Na +/Na) are presented in Figure 5a. This sample was previously charged–discharged three times at 400 mA g −1 in order to consolidate the SEI before evaluating the cycling behavior at 1000 mA g −1.
